description: The notification represents that a rogue AP or a station was
detected by WIDS.
The NMS would refer to MIB table under h3cDot11WIDSDetectGroup
group to get more detailed information.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSDetectRogueTrap H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSRogueMAC s EXAMPL H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSRogueType i 1 H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSMonitorMAC s EXAMPL H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11MonitorAPID s EXAMPLE H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11MonitorApRadioID i 9999

description: Represents which rogue AP or station.
variables.name: H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSRogueMAC

description: Represents the rogue type.
The following value are supported
rogueAp(1) - A rogue AP
rogueStation(2) - A rogue Station
variables.name: H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSRogueType

description: Represents which monitor detected the rogue AP or station.
variables.name: H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSMonitorMAC

description: Represents monitor AP's APID.
variables.name: H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11MonitorAPID

description: Represents monitor AP's radio ID
variables.name: H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11MonitorApRadioID

description: The notification represents a rogue Ad hoc station was detected.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSAdHocTrap H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSAdHocMAC s EXAMPL H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSMonitorMAC s EXAMPL

description: Represents the MAC address of Ad hoc station.
variables.name: H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSAdHocMAC

description: Represents which monitor detected the rogue AP or station.
variables.name: H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSMonitorMAC

description: The notification represents which unauthorized SSID are
accessed in the network.
The notification will be sent to NMS when an
unauthorized SSID is detected on the network for the
first time.

event.Summary: Unauthorized SSID $v1 detected on the network

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSUnauthorSSIDTrap H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11UnauthorSSIDName s EXAMPLE H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSMonitorMAC s EXAMPL H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11MonitorAPID s EXAMPLE H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11MonitorApRadioID i 9999

description: Represents an unauthorized SSID.
variables.name: H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11UnauthorSSIDName

description: Represents which monitor detected the rogue AP or station.
variables.name: H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSMonitorMAC

description: Represents monitor AP's APID.
variables.name: H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11MonitorAPID

description: Represents monitor AP's radio ID
variables.name: H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11MonitorApRadioID

description: The notification represents that a rogue device has aged out
and moved to history table or the device type has been changed
to friendly.
The notification will be sent to NMS whenever a rogue disappears.
Represents which rogue AP or station.
variables.name: H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSRogueMAC

description: This notification occurs when some type of attack is detected.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSDetectAttack H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSAtkHisType i 1 H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSAtkHisChl i 9999 H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSAtkHisDctTime s EXAMPLEE H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSAtkHisAPName s EXAMPLE

description: Represents the type of attack.
variables.name: H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSAtkHisType

description: Represents the channel in which the attack was detected.
variables.name: H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSAtkHisChl

description: Represents the time at which this attack was detected.
variables.name: H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSAtkHisDctTime

description: Represents the name of the AP which detected this attack.
variables.name: H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSAtkHisAPName

description: This notification occurs whenever a detected device is classified
as rogue wireless-bridge.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSDetectWBridge H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSRptAPName s EXAMPLE H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSRptAPRadioID i 9999 H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSRptAPLstDctTime s EXAMPLEE

description: Represents the name of the AP that detected the device.
variables.name: H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSRptAPName

description: Represents the radio index of the AP that detected the device.
variables.name: H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSRptAPRadioID

description: Represents the time at which the rogue AP was detected last time.
variables.name: H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSRptAPLstDctTime

description: This notification occurs when flood attack is detected.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSFloodTrap H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSAtkMac s EXAMPL H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSAtkFrameType s EXAMPLE H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSFirstTrapTime t 31536000

description: Represents mac address of attack source.
variables.name: H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSAtkMac

description: Represents attack frame type.
variables.name: H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSAtkFrameType

description: Represents the first trap time.
variables.name: H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSFirstTrapTime

description: This notification occurs when spoof attack is detected.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSSpoofTrap H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSAtkMac s EXAMPL H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSAtkFrameType s EXAMPLE H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSAtkChannel i 9999 H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSAtkTime s EXAMPLE H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSAtkDestMac s EXAMPL H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSFirstTrapTime t 31536000

description: Represents mac address of attack source.
variables.name: H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSAtkMac

description: Represents attack frame type.
variables.name: H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSAtkFrameType

description: Represents attack channel.
variables.name: H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSAtkChannel

description: Represents when attacking happened.
variables.name: H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSAtkTime

description: Represents mac address of attack destination.
variables.name: H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSAtkDestMac

description: Represents the first trap time.
variables.name: H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSFirstTrapTime

description: This notification occurs when weak IV attack is detected.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSWeakIVTrap H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSAtkMac s EXAMPL H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSAtkChannel i 9999 H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSAtkTime s EXAMPLE H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSAtkDestMac s EXAMPL H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSFirstTrapTime t 31536000

description: Represents mac address of attack source.
variables.name: H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSAtkMac

description: Represents attack channel.
variables.name: H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSAtkChannel

description: Represents when attacking happened.
variables.name: H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSAtkTime

description: Represents mac address of attack destination.
variables.name: H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSAtkDestMac

description: Represents the first trap time.
variables.name: H3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::h3cDot11WIDSFirstTrapTime
